name: Docking Ships
description:
In this captivating world, you find yourself next to a picturesque island. As a skilled captain, it's your task to guide adorable pirate ships through a grid-based maze of waterways and obstacles, ensuring each ship finds its rightful place.

As you progress through the game, the puzzles become progressively more complex, testing your spatial reasoning and puzzle-solving skills. You'll encounter various types of obstacles, each with its unique characteristics, adding an extra layer of strategy to the puzzle-solving experience. Adaptability and forward thinking are essential as you strive to dock all the ships.

Features:
  • 40 unique levels.
  • Cozy seaside soundtrack.
  • Cute ambiance.
